title: ILLICIT LOVER
description: “ I'd like to have three men at once, one for each orifice, with each of them taking turns fisting me. I can only imagine the physical and mental pleasure that would come from being so …”It’s her addiction; her approved “meets.” Conditional approved. In one of her midnight online escapades she meets a somewhat “mysterious eloquently gifted in words lover” who promises to fulfill all her desires if she commits one thing too him –
author: Hēdonē
